# ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy.none

**Case**

A policy that indicates the device doesn’t shield any content.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Shielding Categories

- **ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy.all(except:)**: A policy that indicates the device shields all apps and websites, except content that you specify.
- **ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy.specific(_:except:)**: A policy that indicates the device shields specific categories of activity, with some exceptions.

items.description: A policy that indicates the device shields all apps and websites, except content that you specify.
items.name: ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy.all(except:)

items.description: A policy that indicates the device shields specific categories of activity, with some exceptions.
items.name: ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy.specific(_:except:)

title: ShieldSettings.ActivityCategoryPolicy.none
